amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit any funds from being used to develop or propose legislation to redirect funds allocated from the Gulf of Mexico Energy Security Act (GOMESA).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Byrne.
